name: Device Mockups With Long Shadows
description:
This is a modular system of device mockups with long shadows. It's a great solution for portfolios, decks, social posts, and anywhere else you showcase screens. You can use the devices individually, mix-and-match, or compose multiple devices together with pre-built-scenes.


Devices:

  • iPad Pro Portrait (1024x1366)
  • iPad Pro Landscape (1367x1366)
  • iPhone X (375x812)
  • iPhone 13 Pro Max (428x926)
  • Apple Watch 44mm (184x224)
  • Google Pixel 2XL (411x823)
  • Web Browser (1440x900)
  • Icon (128x128)
  • Icon (60x60)
